name: LVZ
summary:
1st EPリリースから約1年、ふんわりちゃん1stアルバムついに完成！
特設サイト：http://lvz.fnwr.net/
Produced by ふんわりちゃん
Illustration by ミズノシンヤ
Art Direction & Design by Phasma
Vocal:宙乃ねね from Lost in the Fog (M-4) / Julie Watai(M-8)
Remixed by 34423(M-9) / Daisuke Tanabe(M-10)
Recorded & Mixed by Makoto Ohkawa(TBUG) at studio Jive (M-8) 
Mastered by Makoto Ohkawa(TBUG)
info:
